verses.verse: <S%H238>Hear<s%> <S%H7462>us,<s%> Shepherd of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> you who <S%H5090>lead<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> like a <S%H6629>flock,<s%> you who <S%H3427>sit<s%> above the <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> shine <S%H3313>forth.<s%>
<S%H6440>Before<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> stir <S%H5782>up<s%> your <S%H1369>might!<s%> <S%H3212>Come<s%> to save <S%H3444>us!<s%>
Turn us <S%H7725>again,<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%> Cause your <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine,<s%> and we will be <S%H3467>saved.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> How long will you be <S%H6225>angry<s%> against the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of your <S%H5971>people?<s%>
You have <S%H398>fed<s%> them with the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H1832>tears,<s%> and given them <S%H1832>tears<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%> in large <S%H7991>measure.<s%>
You <S%H7760>make<s%> us a source of <S%H4066>contention<s%> to our <S%H7934>neighbors.<s%> Our <S%H341>enemies<s%> laugh among <S%H3932>themselves.<s%>
Turn us <S%H7725>again,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%> Cause your <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine,<s%> and we will be <S%H3467>saved.<s%>
You <S%H5265>brought<s%> a <S%H1612>vine<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> You drove <S%H1644>out<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and planted <S%H5193>it.<s%>
You <S%H6437>cleared<s%> the <S%H6440>ground<s%> for <S%H8328>it.<s%> It took deep <S%H8327>root,<s%> and <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>
The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> were <S%H3680>covered<s%> with its <S%H6738>shadow.<s%> Its <S%H6057>boughs<s%> were like <S%H410>God<s%>'s <S%H730>cedars.<s%>
It sent <S%H7971>out<s%> its <S%H3127>branches<s%> to the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> Its <S%H3127>shoots<s%> to the <S%H5104>River.<s%>
Why have you broken <S%H6555>down<s%> its <S%H1447>walls,<s%> so that all those who <S%H5674>pass<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> pluck <S%H717>it?<s%>
The <S%H2386>boar<s%> out of the <S%H3293>wood<s%> <S%H3765>ravages<s%> <S%H2123>it.<s%> The wild animals of the <S%H7704>field<s%> feed on <S%H7462>it.<s%>
<S%H7725>Turn<s%> <S%H430>again,<s%> we beg you, God of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%> Look <S%H5027>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H7200>see,<s%> and <S%H6485>visit<s%> this <S%H1612>vine,<s%>
the <S%H3657>stock<s%> which your right <S%H3225>hand<s%> <S%H5193>planted,<s%> the <S%H1121>branch<s%> that you made strong for <S%H553>yourself.<s%>
<S%H8313>It<s%>'s burned with <S%H784>fire.<s%> <S%H3683>It<s%>'s cut down. They <S%H6>perish<s%> at <S%H6440>your<s%> <S%H1606>rebuke.<s%>
Let your <S%H3027>hand<s%> be on the <S%H376>man<s%> of your right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> on the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> whom you made strong for <S%H553>yourself.<s%>
So we will not turn <S%H5472>away<s%> from <S%H2421>you.<s%> Revive <S%H7121>us,<s%> and we will call on your <S%H8034>name.<s%>
Turn us <S%H7725>again,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%> Cause your <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine,<s%> and we will be <S%H3467>saved.<s%>
